name: Orbita (Artwish)
description:
Created for the GMTK game jam 2021

Survive as long as you can in this orbit focused arcade style game. Use your moons as defense and offence but be careful not to loose them or else you have nothing. 

This is the first game jam I am entering. It was a lot of work but I think I did a good job! I made everything myself and I had so much fun trying to pull it all together. The most fun part was making the main music. (the title and game over tracks are old tunes I had made for practice). I thought a planet and moons being joined together was a fun take on the theme. I wanted to do something more physics-y with gravity but I didn't know how. Still I think it turned out fun!! 

Tell me what you think and any advice you have! The game was made in clickteam fusion 2.5
